biotools.summary: A web server for predicting distant (outside of proximal promoter regions) regulatory elements (DiRE) in higher eukaryotic genomces using gene co-expression data, comparative genomics as well as transcription factor binding site information. DiRE allows users to start analysis with raw microarray expression data.

bioschemas.name: DiRE
